[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@genesislcap/foundation-comms](./foundation-comms.md) &gt; [Connect](./foundation-comms.connect.md) &gt; [request](./foundation-comms.connect.request.md)

## Connect.request() method

Sends a request to the server to retrieve data or perform an action.

**Signature:**

```typescript
request(resourceName: string, params?: RequestParams): Promise<Message>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  resourceName | string | The name of the resource to request. |
|  params | [RequestParams](./foundation-comms.requestparams.md) | _(Optional)_ An object containing optional parameters to include in the request. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[Message](./foundation-comms.message.md)&gt;

A promise that resolves to a Message containing the server's response.
